title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 (No. 21 of 2014), as adapted by
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Housing (Sale of Local
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Housing (Sale of Local 

Authority Houses) (Amendment) Regulations 2023 

Commencement:
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited housing (sale local authority houses) (amendment) regulation 2023 commencement

title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 (No. 21 of 2014), as adapted by
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 29 January 2024.
text_raw:
2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 29 January 2024. 

Amendment of Housing (Sale of Local Authority Houses) Regulations 
2015:
text_norm: 2 regulation shall come operation 29 january 2024 amendment housing (sale local authority houses) regulation 2015

title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 (No. 21 of 2014), as adapted by
heading: 3. The Housing (Sale of Local Authority Houses) Regulations 2015 (S.I.
text_raw:
3. The Housing (Sale of Local Authority Houses) Regulations 2015 (S.I. 

484 of 2015) are amended: 

(a) 

In Regulation 5, Paragraph (1), by substituting “ten years” for 
“one year” 

(b) 

In Regulation 6, by substituting “€11,000” for “€15,000” 

Revocation of Housing (Sale of Local Authority Houses) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2021:
text_norm: 3 housing (sale local authority houses) regulation 2015 (s.i 484 2015) amended (a) regulation 5 paragraph (1) substituting ten year one year (b) regulation 6 substituting eur11 000 eur15 000 revocation housing (sale local authority houses) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 (No. 21 of 2014), as adapted by
heading: 4. The Housing (Sale of Local Authority Houses) (Amendment)
text_raw:
4. The Housing (Sale of Local Authority Houses) (Amendment) 

Regulations 2021 (S.I. 776 of 2021) are hereby revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 December, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [619] 3
text_norm: 4 housing (sale local authority houses) (amendment) regulation 2021 (s.i 776 2021) hereby revoked given official seal 11 december 2023 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 15th december 2023 619 3

title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 (No. 21 of 2014), as adapted by
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations revoke the Housing (Sale of Local Authority Houses) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2021 (S.I. 776 of 2021) and amend the Housing 
(Sale of Local Authority Houses) Regulations 2015 (S.I. 484 of 2015) to:
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation revoke housing (sale local authority houses) (amendment) regulation 2021 (s.i 776 2021) amend housing (sale local authority houses) regulation 2015 (s.i 484 2015)

title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 (No. 21 of 2014), as adapted by
heading: 1. Provide that the minimum income criteria is reduced to €11,000, and
text_raw: 1. Provide that the minimum income criteria is reduced to €11,000, and
text_norm: 1 provide minimum income criterion reduced eur11 000

title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 (No. 21 of 2014), as adapted by
heading: 2. Change the requirement for the duration of receipt of social housing
text_raw:
2. Change the requirement for the duration of receipt of social housing 

support from one to ten years.
